item.description:
Some of you may know that this is Providence Craft Beer Week. Certainly the P-Collective must not let this pass uncelebrated! According to their ad in Motif Magazine, three bars are holding the following craft brew events this Thursday:

E & O: Abita Brewing Co. 5-7
Avery: Wachusett Brewing Co. 7-9
Julians: Smuttynose Brewing Co. 9-?

All of these have been sites for our past meet-ups, I believe. I propose we meet at E & O at 6:00, head over to the Avery at 7:30ish, and, for those who still have the energy for the third leg of the triangle, try Julians around 9:00. Park once and walk to all three, or just come to one.

See you there!
item.name: The Beermuda Triangle
